description: A notification is sent whenever the BFD session operational state has changed. To enable this notification, the
cienaCesBfdSessionOperTrapState object must be enabled (which is enabled by default). Variable bindings
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionOperStateChangeTrap CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionAdminState i 1 CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionOperState i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This mib object specifies the BFD session name.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionName

description: A unique identifier for BFD Session entry.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionIndex

description: This object specifies the admin state of BFD Session.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionAdminState

description: This object specifies the operational state of BFD Session.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BFD-MIB::cienaCesBfdSessionOperState
